channel.title: CVE Feed for jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit

item.title: CVE-2024-1327|2024-04-03T02:32:45.991Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's image box widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1326|2024-03-12T23:33:52.349Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via HTML Tag attributes in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-0334|2024-05-01T12:46:30.555Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the custom attribute of a link in several Elementor widgets in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-29101|2024-03-19T15:50:52.859Z -- Jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jegtheme Jeg Elementor Kit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Jeg Elementor Kit: from n/a through 2.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32721|2024-04-24T10:09:51.279Z -- Jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jegtheme Jeg Elementor Kit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Jeg Elementor Kit: from n/a through 2.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-3161|2024-05-02T16:52:02.521Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the countdown widget's attributes in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3819|2024-05-02T16:52:01.563Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's JKit - Banner widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3162|2024-04-03T02:32:46.566Z -- jegtheme -- Jeg Elementor Kit
item.description: The Jeg Elementor Kit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Testimonial Widget Attributes in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
